label: 朝賀
対訳語: The first royal audience of the new year
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: The first royal audience of the new year, usually held on the first day of the year. From Shōmu's time onward, the tennō appeared in the full raiment of a Chinese Son of Heaven (tenshi 天子) for this occasion, to receive felicitations from officialdom, foreign emissaries, and domestic tributaries.　[聖武]
